Technology.Name: Subspace Theory
Technology.LongDescription: We have known for a long time that forces beyond our observable reality have an effect on our observable reality. With a deeper understanding of subspace theory, we can begin to benefit from practical applications of this knowledge.

UnlockedBonus.Name: StarDrive Enhancement
UnlockedBonus.Description: Increase effective Warp speeds by 15% for all ships in your empire influence zone.
